pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors sd White and Bright Cream Skin Whitening Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors sd white™ & bright 50ml is an advanced skin lightening complex that reduces skin pigmentation by 60% and lightens the skin by 1.9% in 4 weeks.

Skin Doctors sd white™ & bright advanced skin lightening complex helps to:Decrease melanin synthesis by 79% for optimal whitening and brightening resultsReduce the appearance of pigmented spots by 21% in 4 weeks and 30% after 8 weeksLighten the skin by 1.9% in 4 weeks and 2.9% in 8 weeksRestore and maintains evenly distributed skin tone and colourRecommended for:All skin typesSkin with pigmentation resulting from all causes e.g. sun exposure, pregnancy, age, genetics and environmental factorsDarker skin tones to brighten and even the complexion

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:Beta-WhiteTM - peptide for significant skin lightening benefits.Octyl Methoxycinnamate & Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane - reduce pigmentation caused by UV exposure.Vitamin E - skin moisturisation and antioxidant protection.All Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Sorbitan Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate /Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Squalane, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Oligopeptide-68, SodiumOleate, Disodium EDTA, Cetyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Process: After cleansing with Skin Doctors™ pH balancing cleanser, massage a pea sized amount into face, neck and décolletage. Best results: Use morning and night. Use in conjunction with Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day and your choice of Skin Doctors™ moisturiser at night. NOTE: SPF50 Sun protection is advised when using this product.
